name: 應用光學
goals: 學習光學中比較常用的應用理論，包括幾何光學、干涉光學，以及繞射光學三大部分。
藉由相關的應用例，讓學生可以從基礎的理論跨入實際的應用，培養學生日後分析與設計複雜光學系統的能力。
syllabus:
1.  Introduction to Optics 光學簡介
2.  Aberration 像差
3.  Imaging principle of lens 透鏡成像原理
4.  Simulation software example I: Rays and Ray Sketching
5.  Simulation software example II: Ledgers to Laptops
6.  Simulation software example III: How to Put a Lens in a Computer
7.  Simulation software example IV: To First Order…
8.  Simulation software example V: Stop and Pupils and Windows
9.  Simulation software example VI: Spherical Aberration
10.  Simulation software example VII: Coma and Astigmatism
11.  Simulation software example VIII: Aberrations of the Image Surface
12.  Simulation software example IX: Chromatic Aberration
13.  Simulation software example X:  Reducing Aberrations
14.  Simulation software example XI: Analyzing the Performance of a Lens
15.  Simulation software example XII: Designing a Lens
16.  Simulation software example XIII: Tolerancing

methodologies.note: Introduce the concepts and basic theories of applied optics
Learn how to use the software COVE V to design optics
